content:
Stretch Goal
------------

### Start Timer

* Endpoint path: /api/timers/{appointment\_id}/start/
* Endpoint method: PUT
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Response: Updated appointment information with timer\_total set to 0
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "id": "integer",
    "customer_name": "string",
    "customer_phone": "string",
    "vehicle_make": "string",
    "vehicle_model": "string",
    "vehicle_year": "integer",
    "vehicle_color": "string",
    "notes": "string",
    "is_approved": "boolean",
    "timer_total": "integer",
    "service_id": "integer"
}
```

### Update Timer

* Endpoint path: /api/timers/{appointment\_id}/update/
* Endpoint method: PUT
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Request shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "timer_total": "integer"
}
```
* Response: Updated appointment information with timer\_total set to provided value
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "id": "integer",
    "customer_name": "string",
    "customer_phone": "string",
    "vehicle_make": "string",
    "vehicle_model": "string",
    "vehicle_year": "integer",
    "vehicle_color": "string",
    "notes": "string",
    "is_approved": "boolean",
    "timer_total": "integer",
    "service_id": "integer"
}
```
